titleStmt.title: Declamationum excerpta according to manuscript CLM309. An electronic transcription.
titleStmt.author: Calpurnius Flaccus

availability.licence: This work is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License. To view a copy of this license, visit http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/4.0/.

layoutDesc.layout: In the section of Calpurnius (ff. 147r-160v), all pages have 28 lines, except the last one (f. 160v).

handDesc.handNote: Unidentified hand that wrote most of manuscript.
Corrections by first hand or another hand.

char.charName: LATIN SMALL LETTER E WITH OGONEK
char.desc: The character ę (e caudata) has no standard mapping. The ę can be resolved in 'ae' in most cases, but also in 'oe' or 'e'.

ab.w: quamLH reads qua, but the abbr. seems to always be resolved to quam elsewhere in B.
undeAbbr. could be un(um), but it makes less sense.
magisiusCorrected from magis to maius, prob. by B1.
quorumHåkanson reads quarum, but with doubt (ut vid.).

unclear.reason: Letter d unclear because of correction.

add.w: itidemLetter t unclear because of correction.
